website_summaries.verdict: For safety and ease of use, the Nippit is a great choice.
pros: The long rubber-coated handle is easy to hold and isn't likely to slip, reducing the risk of nicks
Though they're designed with toenails in mind, these clippers work well for clipping nails or trimming cuticles
5 inches in length from blade to handle
cons: Some customers found the angle of the blades awkward

website_summaries.verdict: The generously padded handles allow for easy squeezing on thick nails.
pros: These sharp clippers are made with a proprietary non-slip handle and use simple squeezing action, preventing hand fatigue
They offer a lifetime replacement warranty

customer_reviews.title: Harperton Nippit is Better Than a Podiatrist's Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is diabetic so his feet require special attention. We recently went to a Podiatrist to have his toenails trimmed and I decided to just buy some great clippers and do it myself. These work great! Saves us trips to the doctor for toe-nail trimming - his nails are so thick and hard! Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S

customer_reviews.title: Great! The only thing that works for my aunt's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! The only thing that works for my aunt's thick toenails.
customer_reviews.author: S. mullen

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough for big toe to avoid cutting into the "quick"
customer_reviews.text: This clipper is best for smaller feet. The cut width isn't big enough for my big toe and I actually cut it to behind the white nail. The angled head is nice for visibility but the blade needs to be straight to prevent its very sharp point cutting into the wrong spot. I think it will work on​ my other toes but the curve really isn't the best for toenails. I wish I'd run into a review of the same problem and maybe there was one. I'm going to return it and try to find one exactly like it with a straight blade.
customer_reviews.author: Historken

customer_reviews.title: Great! No pain clipping thick nails! A+++
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! No pain! Husband has thick fungal toenails and normally uses his pocket knife to whittle them down some. He fears nail nippers because they normally crush the nail instead of cutting it nicely. Not with these! They cleanly cut the thickest nails without crushing or twisting. The drugstore ones are already in the trash, and as a bonus, now the tea tree oil has a chance of working because it is hitting deeper nail tissue. By the way, "Dr nail clipper" on YouTube has great videos on how to manage these fungal nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver.  Instant relief and an excellent overall shape, design, and feel.
customer_reviews.text: Only fair to review these. The shape is excellent and will prove to be a wise investment for years to come. I am plagued with ingrown toenails on my big toe, inner nail bed. Generally solved by cutting at a very hard angle and grabbing the long end and pulling to continue the tear and remove the nail from my toe. Not always a success, as my most recent was bad enough to look for another solution. Was able to cut further down, and remove the ingrown portion of the nail. No pain or issues cutting, and instant relief once the ingrown portion was removed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: You're probably going to make yourself bleed.
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with quality. I read the reviews and being a hard head didn't see why I should cut myself with a glorified pair of nail clips. I've never cut myself or anyone else cutting nails. Surely these people were doing something wrong. From the very first use these wanted to grab flesh. If one person nips themselves maybe it's them. If a bunch of people nips themselves more than likely it's something about the design. You've been warned. Do what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight E. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Ingrown Toenail
customer_reviews.text: After pain with my ingrown toenail for a while, I checked out Amazon reviews and bought two nail clippers. The Nipper Nail Clipper worked the better of the two for me and I used it satisfactorily for about a year. Then I don't know what changed about my ingrown toenail, but I was no longer able to clip all the nail causing pain. I went back to the Amazon reviews and decided to try the Zizzili Nail Clipper. With that clipper I am able to easily clip the nail to relieve the pain, and also the cut edge is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers you can buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are no B.S. clippers. My toenails get ingrown every few months and I have to cut them out so I have been using some cheaper ones. They do OK but are hard to use and get all the nail out. These are like gold. My wife got ahold of them and went to town on my toenail that started to get ingrown. She could cut it all out in a couple minutes. These things will definitely do the trick for any type of toenails and cut out ingrown toenails easy. Don't go with the cheap clippers...get these and they will be the last ones you need to buy. And no I did not receive an discount for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after the first use. I thought I could fix it, the handle on one side fell off. The inner piece looked rusted. I would skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A Waste of Time and Money For Thick Nails
customer_reviews.text: When applying a lot of pressure in order to attempt to cut a thick nail, the ends of the handles actually bend enough to come together stopping the blades from closing! What a nutty design. Did they not realize that this could happen? Anyway, this design flaw makes these clippers virtually useless for me. Sure, it's good-looking, heavy, sharp but if you can't bring the cutting blades fully together, this is basically a fatally flawed product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Gross

customer_reviews.title: they are great for doing intricate snipping and working on ingrown toenails
customer_reviews.text: I got these thinking they are normal toenail scissors. Perhaps they are, but I cannot figure out how to use them that way. However, they are great for doing intricate snipping and working on ingrown toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalee Bloss

customer_reviews.title: Useless: twists but does not cut.
customer_reviews.text: Failed, right out of the box. Looks sharp but did not cut at all. Good only for a painful twist. Years ago, I bought a great German cutter from Amazon. It was expensive, but did a superb job. However, my wife found it and used it to trim the nails of our mastiff, which dulled it for further use on humans. I'll go back to looking for another German cutter, then hide it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richard Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Horrible item!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. It;s way too hard to use and painful on smaller toes. I threw mine away. I use the regular toenail clipper, that works far better then this thing. I would give it minus stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The BEST nail trimmer that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did Nippit do a fantastic job... I swear that I have the best nail trim that I have done on my feet. I will experience "Happy Feet" with continual use of Nippit. I purchased this product on impulse... I'm so glad I did... this product definitely meets my expectations: Quality Ease of Use Stable, comfortable fit in my hands. Easy to control. Precision cutting that can reach into tight spaces safely. The BEST nail trimmer that I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter 88

customer_reviews.title: Strong Fingers and vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The only nice thing to say about these clippers is that the spring between the handles works nicely. I don't have crazy thick nails but these clippers needed such force to work it even when wet that the nail would fling across the room and not nice cuts either. I actually purchased these for my mother since they were rated very well but she said she couldn't use them so my entire family (kids included) gave it a try only to be disappointed. And make sure you have a dust pan or vacuum on hand because by the time you're done the clippings will be everywhere and in many pieces as it breaks it off instead of clipping it.
customer_reviews.author: Stasey

customer_reviews.title: Was Excellent Product for super thick gnarly nails
customer_reviews.text: This item is super sharp and effectively and easily trimmed the excess ends and surface of thicken gnarly toe nails. After a month of almost daily use, it is still very sharp. I looked up videos online on what to do about thicken toe nails and this was recommended. Update...8/7. The metal spring part that works to keep it open broke today. Thus rendering it useless. Will call them and see if it can be replaced. Pass the return date of July 1 so can't return. Update...8/10. Emailed company. Quickly answered and sent out three springs. Works great again. So back to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: I've Ditched the Old Nail Clippers.
customer_reviews.text: It paid for itself in one use: areas that I either couldn't reach or that couldn't be properly trimmed with traditional nail clippers are now fine, and I can easily put on socks without snagging the material on .... well,, that's enough information. Granted I've had it for only a day, so I can't vouch for longevity (of the clippers) but there are probably others of advanced age who will feel that the immediate benefit outweighs whatever might happen to the clippers over time; however, they do seem sturdy ... and I forgot to mention that those more substantial handles are great. I would have included photos of the result, but I don't feel comfortable receiving tons of romantic emails.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp enough to take a finger off if you're not careful! They work brilliantly. You could probably trim a horse's hooves with these things! Well worth the money, very easy to use, just be very careful! Particularly if you have limited sensation in your feet - diabetics should be extremely cautious. My mom used them and cut the end of a toe really badly but she didn't feel it... so there was a trail of blood all through the house.
customer_reviews.author: kestrelco

customer_reviews.title: Great little clipper
customer_reviews.text: As everyone says this clipper is very sharp so be very careful when using. It is similar to what a doctor would use in his office. It is made for use for those of us who have thickened nails. And dig this, comes with Harperton’s industry-leading 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and Lifetime Replacement Warranty means your purchase is protected by Amazon and backed by Harperton. So even when it is too late to replace by Amazon you can still contact the company. There are rubber holders to make it easy to hold and prevent slippage. A good item for thick nails.
customer_reviews.author: Violetwrites Leftow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.text: When I took the Nippet out of its packaging I was immediately impressed by the heft and quality...this is a serious tool for personal care. In the 2 years since I had my hip joints replaced I’ve physically struggled to bend and reach my toes to give them a proper clipping and I’ve tried several large clippers. I’m happy to say that’s no longer a problem...the Nippet is easy to maneuver into position for a nice decisive toe clipping. I highly recommend it for anyone who has tough nails and difficulty reaching them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T

customer_reviews.title: The one and only
customer_reviews.text: I had despaired of finding clippers strong enough to cut my old thick toenails. Even if they were strong, old weakened hands couldn't get a good grip on them. Then I saw these and figured "why not", they looked promising. They are great. Tough nails are still tough but at least they are doable. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: It won't clip worth a darn. I returned it and bought the Dr. Heally unit, also on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Choosy

customer_reviews.title: I am Unable to use but my wife likes them.
customer_reviews.text: They are sharp but the blade bends the wrong way. Completely useless for me. That being said my wife likes them and can use them. She has hard nails and they cut them without trouble. I give it three stars as the usefulness is 50-50.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Everard

customer_reviews.title: Great Toenail Clipper
customer_reviews.text: After owning this now, I understand better how to cut my toenails (i.e. straight across). I do not use to cut the corner of the nail, however, and use a fingernail cutter or nail file for the smaller touch-up areas as this cutter can easily cut into skin without the utmost care. Haven't owned that long, but this product seems extremely durable and well made. Recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: icetime

customer_reviews.title: These “NIPPIT” toenail clippers really rock !!
customer_reviews.text: The Nippit Toenail Clipper I just received and tried out, is THE BEST clipper you can buy for very thick toenails. Over the years I have purchased at least a dozen clippers that claim to be great for thick nails but all were nothing but regular toenail clippers on a larger metal base. Waste of money! My toenails are as thick as a dime, so I had to go for regular pedicures because I could not trim them myself, until now. Silly as it sounds, these clippers really rock, and without question, I highly recommend purchasing this product. The covered handles on the clipper make it easy to use. You will not be disappointed. Patsyk Boston
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!!  DO IT NOW!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing at taking care of thick and troublesome nails. The only clippers that would handle my thick and ruined big toenail that had curved over onto itself like a wave crashing on the beach. It did such a neat job that I was shocked by how neatly and cleanly it worked. Today my big toe almost looks normal thanks to these meaty little clippers. They are strong and sharp. Perfect for almost any nail cutting task. LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: Slushpuppy154

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are very nice
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet, but i can tell you that in hand these feel much better than others i have had that cost much more. Like the nail clippers, precision made... blades line up perfectly, pivot point action is smooth and they have weight them; and to me that is important. only concern i have is that the blade angle is significantly different than what i have used before, i will need to pay attention when using them
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nippit Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: This nails clipper works very well with little effort required (other than reaching your toes). It seems to be well made but having had it for only a day I have no information about durability. The design is unique and I find it easier to position than the traditional cutters. The company provided excellent and fast service. The first pair I received had been ground incorrectly and would not cut. I contact the company by email, as they suggested, and got a response within a few hours. They shipped me another Nippit promptly, after inspecting the new one first, and did not want me to go to the bother of returning the defective one. The replacement worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Due to blowing out my big toenails several times throughout the years, they keep growing in thicker and thicker and also crooked. This latest go-round they were about 1/4 inch thick. Regular toenail clippers couldn't handle them. I tried some other recommended clippers, but they didn't work. I saw these and decided to try them. They worked perfectly. I am now able to trim down my really thick nails. It's really no effort. Just make sure you have them on the nail and not any skin. They are sharp, but they do the job effortlessly. My only wish is that I had found out about these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Vonn Pinn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good nail clippers, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are toe nail clippers for King Kong. They are heavy duty, very strong. Highly recommend for anyone who has super thick nails and needs serious battle tools. This is a great product. Highly recommend. Super strong steel cuts nails like butter.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Toenail Clipper Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered as ordered and on time. Nippit looks like pliers, has razor sharp edges and end point (comes with a plastic cover), it's curved to fit over the toenail, and it has some kind of rubber or rubber-like grip. Be sure to follow the directions: Soak your nails or shower before using (to soften nail body and edges). Make sure you thoroughly dry your hands, feet and nails; and avoid the fleshy parts of fingers or toes. Keep Nippit out of the reach of children and/or anyone with unstable hands (older folk). Seriously! Great product. I will be ordering from Harperton again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MarDenWar

customer_reviews.title: Spring Broke
customer_reviews.text: Useful for nails with the important exception that the spring broke. Outside the return date & looking for something well crafted that will last more then a few months....UPDATE: Outside the Amazon listed return date, however I emailed the Harperton Company directly and they sent me 3 new springs. The spring must be a regularly recurring issue with the clippers. I upgraded from one star to four stars because of excellent customer service. Not five stars because of the flimsy spring. Clippers with a working spring are the best I ever ever used for my rather thick toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Runyun

customer_reviews.title: If you have nail problems this is the answer!
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve had trouble clipping your nails or have ingrown nails and need to get in there this is your salvation! They are awesome. So much power and control. I’ve seen smaller versions around at drug stores but these are better and don’t flex when you are cutting a thick nail. This allow me to trim my nails and even ingrown nails in ways I never could before and with great control and precision. I can’t believe it took me this long to find these!
customer_reviews.author: garry venable

customer_reviews.title: Toe Much To Be Desired
customer_reviews.text: One of the realizations of aging is that toenails become very tough to trim. Whoever said old folks can become "tough old birds" wasn't joking. These clippers make short work of toenail trimming even for those who have to deal with limited range of motion. The reasons they are so effective are: 1) They are sharp enough to nip right through tough thick nails, 2) The padded arms of the clippers provide excellent leverage making it easy to snap through the nails, and 3) The blades are nicely contoured enabling proper attack against the curved nail shape. I've used just about every nail clipper over the years, and would say these are far and above the best of the lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally an effective nail trimming tool!
customer_reviews.text: I am a diabetic with neuropathy in both my my hands and feet. This makes it both difficult and risky for me to keep my toenails trimmed. I have used other clippers and cut my toes with them. When I received my Harperton Nippit I immediately tried them and was thrilled! They were easy to hold on to and required very little pressure to quickly and effectively cut through my thick toenails. I will never use another clipper again! Thank you for providing such a well designed product.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: IF I COULD WOULD GIVE 10 STARS
customer_reviews.text: I have plaque psriosis and thick torn toenails yak, I've spent hundreds at the Podiatrist's office & have spent hundreds buying nippers, up to $85 a pair, THESE ARE HANDS DOWN THE BEST NOTHING COMES CLOSE, OBVIOUSLY THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS MUST BE FROM COMPETITORS, BUY THESE IF THEY DON'T MEET AND EXCEED YOUR EXPECTATION THE COMING AND AMAZON ARE AWESOME AND YOU CAN DO AN EASY RETURN, I'm glad I don't have to spend LOTS OF MONEY ON HORRIBLE NIPPERS IN BRICK & MORTAR OR ONLINE STORES, THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR SELLING THE BEST ONES AVAILABLE, IN ALL HONESTY CAN'T BELIEVE YOU SELL THEM SO CHEAP.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Schad

customer_reviews.title: These Clippers are the Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick toenails with something growing under them. I have tried many "heavy Duty" toe nail clippers, but none have been able to do the job, I have gone to nail salons & podiatrists, with very limited success. I tried solutions recommenced by podiatrists, These clippers WORK! They are easy to use, well designed to get at different shapes of toe nails. These clippers are also well constructed to last forever. I am highly pleased with them, now I can walk comfortably!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad nails
customer_reviews.text: I have to be really careful cutting my toe nails as I have diabetes. I have one toe that has a fungus infection and can be very difficult to cut. The cutters have made that much easier and made cutting my other nails very straight forward. While nothing can replace having a health care professional cut your nails I know that I can't afford to have a doctor cut them for me as needed. These, for me at least, have made me more comfortable with cutting my own nails.
customer_reviews.author: Retinen

customer_reviews.title: Works well for thickest stubborn toenails!
customer_reviews.text: Long story short all my toenails have pretty much been cured of the issue of thick infected toenails except for one stubborn big toes that needs to be trimmed down every month. Literally about a quarter to half inch thick at the end! These clippers cut through it within about 3 seconds of a squeeze with these clippers. No other clippers would even come close! Well worth the price at $18!!
customer_reviews.author: LJGoose

customer_reviews.title: Review of Harperton Nippit - Precision Toenail Clippers for Thick or Ingrown Toenails
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and finish on the metal parts. Best to use after shower or bath when thick toenails aren't bone dry and very tough. When trying to remove the plastic cover cutter, one of the black grips fell off. The superb customer service sent me a replacement clipper right away. I noticed the replacement has a different cutter cover design making it easier to remove. I highly recommend this clipper and accolades for the customer service. They will contact you directly after your purchase to see if you are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice clipper
customer_reviews.text: These are big, easy to hold, crazy sharp, and angled to make them easy to use. I highly recommend making sure that whats in the cutter needs to be cut off. Yes, that sharp. And with the large padded handles, it's very comfortable. But cut slowly, the leverage on these handles make cutting nails very easy. It's also pretty easy to get a little skin in there. They are pretty much wire cutters with a curved angled cutter. Thinking of getting a pair for the shop to cut zip ties. It would give them a slight rounded end.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get their attention for the warranty is a gong show
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for over a year, minimal use. The spring mechanism snapped and they wont respond for the lifetime warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Well made tool
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Well made tool, cuts thick toenails easy, BUT - there is no promised "precision" at all. Big toe nail got all torn in pieces before I managed to trim all of it.
customer_reviews.author: HaHa, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Major disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I'd give these zero stars if I could. Absolutely of no use at all to me. They slip right off my toenails and clip nothing. I've tried them three times before giving up and using my 50 year old pair. Should have sent them back before my return expired. Going to Walmart to see what they have.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy G.

customer_reviews.title: Why did no one think of this BEFORE???
customer_reviews.text: The Nippit is the best toenail clipper I have ever bought, hands down. I have had thick, hard-to-manage nails since I had ingrown toenail removal about 20 years ago. I don't have to trim them often, but when I do, regular toenail trimmers just can't do the job. The Nippit gave me a level of control that I haven't had with other clippers. They're wicked sharp (which is usually good but can be bad if you're not careful), and the design of the head makes it easy to trim nails evenly, regardless of which hand you are using! It's an intuitive design feature that is so useful you'll wonder why nobody else has ever done it like that!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fortuna

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Seem strong, have used several times and they are great for toenails, good leverage and nice big handles. I'm not a senior, but I do sometimes feel I have a senior's body and muscle tone. :) They are very sharp! They have the perfect angle and I can even use them with my non-dominant hand. You might even get an offer for a free goodie! Love a free goodie! Just order these, the cost is reasonable and quality so far is great!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a large manicure collection. This nipper is the star of it. I have naturally strong and thick nails. It has always been difficult to trim my large toe nails. These nippers are very strong and easy to use. I really like the provided cover for the tip. The handles feel very comfortable and fit ergonomically. However, I have large hands. I WOULD recommend these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers, ever!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike standard toenail clippers, the product is easy to hold and manuver. The powerful jaws can clip through the thickest nails without stress or discomfort to your hands or feet. The angle of the jaws allow the best alignment to cut nails without strain on the wrist. The large, slip proof handles enable you to control the cut with your whole hand and not two fingers like standard clippers, or having to worry about a 'flying clipper' that slips out of you hand, mid cut.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!  LOVE! These Nail Clippers
customer_reviews.text: I ALWAYS GO STRAIGHT TO NEGATIVE REVIEWS IE; THOSE THAT HAVE ONE (1) STAR. These beautiful machined nail clippers are wonderful, both aesthetically and the precision in the way they work! Best decision I’ve made on Amazon in quite awhile. No going wrong here, buy a pair. Oh, the company. “HARPERTON”, stands by all there products with a 100% guarantee, to insure their customers complete satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, bought this to debride toenail fugal damage but should have got a straight edge. Probably good for people that have hand problems, arthritis, carpal tunnel, etc
customer_reviews.author: Annette O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Can it cut big toenails?
customer_reviews.text: Yes it can. Small in size but the best I've used over the many years. As always, big toenails have been hard to cut. These clippers nip right through the nail. I'm old and lost my "Manly Man" strength. Cut right through the nail. Hope this review speaks to you.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas (Sherri's husband)

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about these clippers
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these clippers. They work so much better than what I bought at CVS Pharmacy and Walgreens in the past. I was searching for clippers that actually cut something and these Nippit clippers do that job very well. They are just a few dollars more than what is out there but well worth it. I have been out more money buying different clippers just trying to find something that would cut. I don't expect these clippers to break down soon, but if and when they do, I will buy another pair exactly like them. That is how pleased I am with them.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jones

customer_reviews.title: More precise that the flat edge clippers
customer_reviews.text: I am so used to the typical flat edge clippers that it felt weird using them, but after a few clips I realized these were more precise and I could control where and how much nail to take off. They work so well that the amount of filing afterwards is minimal. The pieces of toe nail that are cut tend to go everywhere moreso with these than the flat edge clippers, but there's more control with these. So glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: bargainhuntress

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. The curved cutters are tricky.
customer_reviews.text: Real sharp and good leverage. But the cutter has a pronounced curve and it is very easy to cut deeper then intended on the end of the clippers that is harder to see (trailing edge). Other than that, the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great Nail Tool
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality nail pliers that can be used to cut and correct toenail issues. I use these over standard nail clippers because the allow for more flexibility in cutting edge regions.
customer_reviews.author: MSE fanatic

customer_reviews.title: good unit, good company
customer_reviews.text: well, good unit, good company; I ended up buying the pedicure pedinova, and use that for my nails; I didn't feel as safe when trying to cut left foot toenails; the angle with such a sharp instrument made me stop using it for that foot, so it didn't quite serve me as well, but it is a good quality product and good company
customer_reviews.author: goddess

customer_reviews.title: Cut easily through thick nails!  Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love these clippers! Not only do they cut easily through thick nails, it really makes doing my own nails possible even with Rheumatoid arthritis. Harperton’s customer service is also amazing! When the metal spring broke, they were quick in sending me 3 replacement springs, checked to make sure I received them and was completely satisfied with the product. I’ve never had such great customer service! (Thanks, Jenny L.!)
customer_reviews.author: ker

customer_reviews.title: Great clippers from a Top Notch Company!
customer_reviews.text: This company is top notch! I ordered these clippers to cut my 90 yr mothers toenails. When I finally got around to opening the box I found the clippers were defective. A company representative had already contacted me to see how I liked the product. I emailed her back and told her of the problem. They immediately sent out a new pair with an additional product for me to enjoy. She also followed up again to make sure I was happy with the replacement. The clippers work great! Very smooth cut and very responsive on those tough nails of the elderly. They will make a usually uncomfortable task much easier. I will definitely look at other products of this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greaat cutters!
customer_reviews.text: At my age it is hard to get your feet up in order to cut toenails. Using those little snippers just don't work well enough on hardened toenails. I bought this cutter and it works great and is fast enough to where I don't have to have my foot in a painful position longer than needed. I would buy again, they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M. Bates

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this nail clipper. I was having trouble holding regular clippers. My fingers would slip off of regular clippers. These clippers are AWESOME. You are able to grip them and clip your nails perfectly. They are easy to use and clip easily..
customer_reviews.author: westman407

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. Workmanship is excellent. Design makes it easy to work and operate. I never would have thought there would have been this much difference between these instruments and the competitors. It leaves him in the dust–no competition at all. If you need a nail clipper get these they beat anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: You Won't be Sorry!
customer_reviews.text: I got these after a frustrating experience with another pair of so-called heavy duty toenail clippers. That pair has been getting harder to use and I dread having to cut my toenails. The Harperton Nippit had excellent reviews so I had to see for myself. Luckily the shipping was quick, so I got to see for myself that these are sturdy, comfortable to use, and more importantly do the job with sharp and neat cuts. Well priced too!
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, fast shipping, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot to say about a product like this, especially if there's no Cons to notify other customers about. This item is overpowered for me. I bought it as a convenience when my clipper rusted and broke. This clipper works. It's great, comfortable, sharp, and just a little too much for my needs, but I still recommend it, and I'll still use it.
customer_reviews.author: sci f.

customer_reviews.title: precision instrument, but smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: They're well made and work fine, although they were quite a bit smaller than I had envisioned; perhaps the size was properly quoted in the subtext but I hadn't read it. They're barely big enough to fit in your hand unless you're 7 years old. Other than that, they are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Harperton Nippit Toenail Clipper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Toenail Clipper I would buy it again, and recommend it to anyone who's looking for something like this especially for this low price Works exactly like it should be not much to say about it! It does what it's design/made for. Happy with this purchase! I would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Laczko Studio

customer_reviews.title: These clippers are terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick toenails, and have tried several brands and models of clippers. They typically have a straight cutting angle, which is parallel to the handle. This makes it difficult for me to get a close cut. The Nippet cutters have a 45-deg angle (or thereabout), and along with the curved blades, makes it easier to trim more closely. The wide handles also makes the clippers easier to grip, and therefore easier to apply pressure when cutting. I am very happy with my purchase and highly recommend the Nippit Clippers.
customer_reviews.author: Repro Bait

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband because regular nail clippers will not cut his thick nails. I always research a product and chose this one because of the warranty and good reviews. My husband's first comment was "these are doctor quality." The trimmers are great, and so is this company. I'm very impressed with their communication with customers. Would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: TNVic

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I found the company that created these and contacted them directly! They are sending me a new pair, EXCELLENT customer service. I really hope they improve the springs, these nippers are amazing. Or just sell or include a replacement spring. These are great but the middle spring broke. Not sure if you can buy a replacement part and I have no idea how to fix it since the metal broke in half.
customer_reviews.author: Kbm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to manicure people's toenails which aren't in great shape. This works very well on them. They're good quality and seem to hold up well. The tip cover is also a nice touch. They're comfortable in my hand and I feel like I get the control I need. I also notice it doesn't block the view of what I'm doing, which is a huge benefit.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Exxcellent nippers
customer_reviews.text: These nippers are very well made. The fit and finish is very nice. They fit my large and old hands very nicely. I have trouble squeezing with my left hand due to nerve damage and with the heft and extra size of the grips these are easy for me to use. Not to mention that the cutting edge is extremely sharp which contributes to the ease of use. I highly recommend these toe nail nippers.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It did exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Sharp enough it snipped all my fungus off. I seen pictures of a lot of bad nails in the reviews well just say my right foot was just as bad as the photos you see in the other reviews. It clipped those babies right off. Be careful and follow the instructions wash your foot first and let them dry all the way. These clippers ARE SHARP! I had no issues it was fast and simple and clippers are still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Nail Clippers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They are every thing that was promised and more! I got them for the handles as my hands don't work like they once did and am very impressed with how easy they are to use and how well they cut. I even used them on my finger nails as the clippers I got for them were horrid. I am very glad I found the only clippers I will use from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Ferocious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are great, If you have thickened toenails these do the trick. They feel like a quality tool in your hands and clip cleanly in situations ordinary nail clippers would not handle. I would imagine they would be great for a person that has limited movement or dexterity in their hands and fingers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The easy grip handle is a real plus. The blades are sharp and oriented in such a way to make trimming toenails much easier. I highly recommend this particular one as it is my favorite toenail clipper. . Nothing can be more aggravating than to get a clipper orientated correctly on the nail only to have the handle slip in your hand. That problem is alleviated with this clipper and its generous non slip handle.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wesch

customer_reviews.title: I hated trimming my toenails because it was always such a ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased Nippit toenail clippers. In the past, I hated trimming my toenails because it was always such a chore. I could never get clean cuts with my old clippers, and the result was unevenly cut toenails. I would often wait too long until the next time I trimmed my toenails again. Fed up, I researched toenail clippers. I ran across Nippit, and decided to try them. Why did I wait so long? Nippit is the right tool for the job. It is effortless to cut my toenails now. The cuts are smooth and even. The shape of the cutting edge, makes trimming ingrown toenails easy. I, actually, look forward to trimming my toenails now!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: POWER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t even know a toe nail clipper this powerful was possible. It completely changes the toe nail clipping game. You can get deep and the power allows you to cut the nail shorter than you ever thought possible. POWER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DDSW

customer_reviews.title: wish i had bought these 20 years ago
customer_reviews.text: These cleared up an in-growing toenail with little effort. I wish I had bought these years ago. I had been battling an in-growing toenail with conventional clippers, which don't 'cut it.' Now I use these to cut all my nails. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mgriff9

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work well. Sharp and strong. Big disappointment when the right grip slid off the metal handle tang. Now when I put the handle back on, it does not set back in the same position, making them a little awkward to use. It's sad to pay a higher price thinking you will get a better product and most times the cheaper products outlast the pricey ones. I am updating the information here. A gentleman named Sam contacted me and offered to correct the problem. I received a new pair of these the other day. I will upgrade to four stars for the excellent follow up. Thank you Sam
customer_reviews.author: cd mixer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: These are quality nail clippers. Well made and will trim nails. Amazon has provided an outlet for small companies to compete and provide quality items at reasonable prices. This company is a good example of that!!!! Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rattler10jr

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 10 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with a single toenail that regular clippers (and I tried several different brands) would not cut. The Nippit is AMAZING. It cuts perfectly. I am sure it has saved me a big podiatrist bill. Really can't say enough positive things about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: These hefty & very sharp nail nippers started out great but now, just 3-4 months after purchase (to late to return them) they no longer work properly. The grip surface on one side of the handle slides off taking the flip-down spring with it making the blades stay closed. Very disappointing. I thought I was getting quality nippers.
customer_reviews.author: JATalbot

customer_reviews.title: Strong cutter for thick nails
customer_reviews.text: I do not have toenails. I have 10 miniature horse hooves. Standard nail clippers, even the expensive ones, would spontaneously disassemble after 2 or 3 difficult cuttings. These are very well made, nearly surgical in function. 10 minutes after their arrival, my horse hooves...erm, I mean toenails, were trimmed like never before. I am considering buying another pair to prune delicate orchids.
customer_reviews.author: Slice

customer_reviews.title: Prevent ingrown toenails
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are wonderful. I love the grippy handles, and they are tough - they will cut through thick toenails. They are pointed enough to get into the corners of your toes and prevent ingrown toenails. When you first look at them it seems like overkill - do I really need these? Yes, you do.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly functional
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are beyond good; they are in a class of their own. I have tried numerous types of clippers over the years, but none match these. The hardened steel cuts nails with true ease, and the nature of the handle and the angle of the cutting surface make the physical task of reaching over the leg and clipping (normally difficult) amazingly easy. Very solid piece. A superbly crafted tool. Harperton, you have produced an extraordinary product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Nippet is by far the easiest clipper to use!
customer_reviews.text: Having two elderly parents I am aware of how difficult it usually is to clip their toenails. It has always been unpleasant for both of us. But this time, using nail Nippit I was done in minutes and it was very easy. The Nippits made a big difference! They seem much more "heavy duty" then clippers I have used in the past. Plus they must be super sharp as they clipped each nail in one press of the clipper. One more thing, they are made to stamp in your grasp. A lot of research had to have gone into the design of the Nippit.
customer_reviews.author: DIANA CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Two words: GREAT! QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting much of this purchase. I just thought it would be one of those "made in <elsewhere>" products. I was so very pleasantly surprised when I used the product for the first time: the precision engineering, the clean design, the "feel" of the product in my hands. Harperton will most definitely be my first stop for similar products! Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Pawan Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: OMG, finally found toenail clippers that actually work with ease and precision. Actual research & engineering had to be performed to achieve such a perfect set of toenail clippers. Wish I found clippers like these years ago. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: bsinla

customer_reviews.title: Best clippers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, rugged and sharp. Best clippers I've used. My spring in the middle snapped after over a years use but other than that, they've been holding up well
customer_reviews.author: subiedoobie

customer_reviews.title: GEAT CUSTOMER SERVICE GREAT RESPONSE TO MALFUNTION
customer_reviews.text: FAIL ON PRODUCT IN ORIGINAL ORDER, CUSTOMER SERVICE RESPONDED, REPLACED AT N/C AND I WOULD RECOMMEND THESE REALLY SHARPE AND BEST TOE NAIL CLIPPER I HAVE EVER OWN
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R GREENFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is true!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best clippers if you have thick neglected toenails. I was skeptical since I tried other clippers. I was skeptical of the reviews. Could they be as good as promoted? Other clippers were either not sharp enough to cut my thick neglected toenails or hurt my toenails as they tended to bend, not cut the toenail. I did not even have to soak my toenails as these clippers cut right through my very thick toenails. You will not be disappointed if you buy these clippers. They are well worth the money if you are looking to cut thick toenails.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie's dad

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to use these clippers. They are just a big pair of wire cutters. They require more force to cut than regular nail cutters. It is difficult to get these clippers in the proper position and orientation to make a good cut. Also the nail cuttings fly off into the air instead of being collected as with most nail cutters.
customer_reviews.author: John Tortora

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This nippit is wonderful! I can hold on easily & they cut perfectly! So nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Hard Toe Nails conquered
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe the strength these little clippers have. First time I've been able to trim my big hard toe nails so easily.
customer_reviews.author: sgyrag

customer_reviews.title: A good tool
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found these. The quality is high, cutter is sharp and with its generous comfortable handles is easy to use. I have a split big toenail that I need to trim back. I used to use the corner of my nail clipper but it was hard to both see and cut where I wanted. These clippers make it so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bikel

customer_reviews.title: I have thick toenails and these clippers trimmed my nails quickly and easily. I even tossed my old ones out
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of buying the clippers because I've purchased a few different kinds of toenail clippers over the years that were sub-par, and I didn't want to go wasting my money again on a product that only half-delivered on its promises. I have to say that I was really impressed with NIPPIT! I have thick toenails and these clippers trimmed my nails quickly and easily. I even tossed my old ones out!
customer_reviews.author: splench

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for ingrown toenails
customer_reviews.text: This has been my savior. I have reoccurring ingrown toenails, not because of poor shoe choices just bad genes, according to my doctor. This clipper has become my go to tool to handle this reoccurring problem. It's precise and allows me to cut my nail safely and fast. I would recommend this tool for anyone experiencing my same painful problem. Worth the money...trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like these. They are hard to handle and ackward to use. There is no spring action like most clippers. I’m returning them and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just a man

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a tool that works on thick toenails
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, well made quality toenail clippers. It has a precision blade that cuts through thick toenails. The padded gripper allows it to remain securely in the hand's grasp and allows the hand to apply full pressure without any sense the tool will slip either from the hand or from its placement on the toenail. This clippers has made a once difficult task much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Wiconi

customer_reviews.title: Best that I have every owned, by far.
customer_reviews.text: These were less expensive and higher quality than the name brand clippers that I purchased at a drug store. And the design makes them very easy to use, even by some one who is old with poor eye sight.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The last clippers you’ll ever need or want to own
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality clippers that are precision made and a pleasure to use, at least if clipping your nails can be considered a pleasure. I look forward to never buying another cheap quality clippers again. Definitely recommended. And their customer service and follow up on your purchase are top notch as well.
customer_reviews.author: FrankW

product_meta.title: Harperton Nippit - Precision Toenail Clipper Tool for Thick or Ingrown Toenails
product_meta.description:
We can all agree that most nail nippers clippers don’t make the cut, right? From poorly crafted joints and hinges to dull blades that rip and don’t cut, we’ve seen it all. And that’s what inspired us to make the Nippit a fantastic nail clipping tool that you’ll absolutely love.

What makes it better?

Naturally good: We designed the Nippit to be held at natural clipping angle, allowing you to see where you’re cutting and preventing painful nicks and cuts along the way.

Universally designed: The Nippit’s handles allow for optimum grip flexibly, because we know that good tools should fit as many hands as possible.

Carefully constructed: Each blade edge is finished by hand and is the last step in our 14-part manufacturing process. This ensures the blades meet cleanly and require the lest effort possible to get a great clip.

Harperton’s unmatched Lifetime Warranty and 30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee: If your Nippit fails due to manufacturer defect, simply return it to our Warranty Center and we'll fix or replace it, forever. It's that simple. We also want you to be happy, so if you're not 100% satisfied with your new Harperton Nippit, let us know within 30 days of purchase and we'll issue a full refund. Easy peasy!
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE: The Nippit nail nipper was designed to easily clip nails of all sizes, making it the best toe nail clippers for thick nails, ingrown toenails and they can assist in toenail fungus treatment as needed.

VERSATILE: Precision crafted blades will make your manicure pedicure routine making quick work of finger nail and toe nail trimming. The Nippit is also a nice addition to your cuticle nipper trimmer, nail oil and cuticle oil nail fungal treatments.
GUARANTEED: Comes with Harperton’s industry-leading 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and Lifetime Replacement Warranty means your purchase is protected by Amazon and backed by Harperton.
ERGONOMIC: Unique handle design is constructed from heavy duty polymers and coated in a proprietary non-slip material delivering great clip no matter what.

OTHER: This toe nail clipper and cuticle trimmer was built for a variety of uses including: assistance with toenail scissors, toenail clippers for thick nails, toenail clippers heavy duty trimming and assisting with toenail fungal treatment.
